name: Stormy Seas
description:
You are a crate. Brave a storm across the ocean on your uncontrollable boat.

Keyboard

 - Use WASD or arrow keys to roll

 - Use SPACE or ENTER to jump

 - Use ESC or BACKSPACE to exit game

Gamepad

 - Use Left stick to roll

 - Use any directional button to jump

 - Use Start or Select to exit game
